snippet: Home Shopping Network is selling more than 275 Coca-Cola items on its cable channel, online, on mobile devices and through social media.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that Home Shopping Network, taking advantage of holiday season, is selling more than 275 Coca-Cola items on its cable channel, online, on mobile devices and through social media.
lead_paragraph: Home Shopping Network is selling more than 275 Coca-Cola items on its cable channel, online, on mobile devices and through social media.

headline.seo: Coke and Shopping Network Unite to Sell Brand Items
headline.main: More Than a Soft Drink, Coke Is an Array of Goods
headline.print_headline: More Than a Soft Drink, Coke Is an Array of Goods
